question: The Narora atomic power plant is located in which district of Uttar Pradesh?

In India the rainfall is mainly orographic. Which among the following follows the word in bold?
optionA: The rainfall occurs when the moist air becomes saturate
optionB: The rainfall occurs when the masses of air pushed by wind are forced up by large mountains
optionC: The rainfall occurs on only one side of the mountains
optionD: The rainfall is lesser in Rain shadow areas
correctAns: The rainfall occurs when the masses of air pushed by wind are forced up by large mountains
